title: Drawing, "Details of Flowers, Plants and Trees Along a River Bank, Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper center:  whitish gray stem / Tree / reddish brown / seed; at top right:  Trees entirely smothered by vines; and at bottom right:  Heavy masses of trees with lighter / green trees and shrubs before.
description: Horizontal view of details of plants and flowers at top left and center, a group of trees on a river bank at top right, and larger mass of trees at bottom right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Details of Flowers, Plants and Trees Along a River Bank, Rio Magdalena, Colombia", 1853, probably May.
1853, probably May. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-848-b.
